name: lemon drizzle mittens
notes:
lately, my knitting has been inspired by one of my other favorite hobbies...baking! in part 4 of this mystery kal, i will share a recipe for my favorite lemon drizzle cake.

these mittens will be a mystery kal hosted in the [i make mittens](/groups/i-make-mittens) group during november 2024. parts will be released on:

november 1 - part 1
november 8 - part 2
november 15 - part 3
november 22 - part 4

this pattern is fairly easy to adapt for size/density. as written, the mitten knits up as a typical knit fabric. if you like a denser mitten, try a worsted weight yarn knit to the same gauge. you could also use worsted weight yarn with a slightly larger needle to knit at a larger gauge for an even larger size.

**yarn requirements:**
dk weight yarn - between 150-200 yds 

*sample mittens knit with jaeger matchmaker merino dk, which is sadly discontinued. this yarn came with 130 yds/50 gms; 2 balls were necessary to knit a pair, with plenty leftover.*

as always, use needles that work for you to get the correct gauge.
